Hi <@U012F502T62>!
My colleague stumbled across this and brought me here. Im the main dev of POWER. My answer would have been the same as BJâ€™s, but since the file does not load, I am happy to assist you. I would need to have a closer look directly on your portal if this is ok with you. Ideally CMS Dev rights for this email address => <mailto:mzweng@maka-agency.com|mzweng@maka-agency.com>

Markus

Hi - I am trying to add a boolean field `{% boolean "transparent_header" label='Header Variation', value=False, no_wrapper=True, export_to_template_context=True %}` into the global header of our theme and during the validation, I received an error *"We recommend tooltips and more descriptive labels."*. Someone, please guide me on how I can add the tooltip or change the label of that check box.
